# # Ewallet
An object representing e-wallet details for invoices.

```php
use Xendit\Invoice\Ewallet;
```

## Properties

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Examples |
|------------|:-------------:|:-------------:|-------------|:-------------:|
| **ewallet_type** | [**EwalletType**](EwalletType.md) | ☑️ |  | null |
